description:
Different core projects in our ecosystem have a dramatically different make up among the leadership of the their developer teams. This talk explores those differences in representation, and how to measure them quantitatively. It will then present some of the qualitative lessons we can learn from this data.
See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: Inequality of Underrepresented Groups in Core Project Leadership
